title: India 's petroleum imports by value 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Import value in billion Indian rupees
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Years, and Import value in billion Indian rupees in each Years on the y axis.
The maximum Import value in billion Indian rupees 9978.85 is found at Years FY 2014 and the minimum is found at FY 2011 where Years is 4822.82.
There is a difference of 5156.03 between the maximum Years FY 2014 and minimum Years FY 2011.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Years in the x axis and Import value in billion Indian rupees in the y axis.

max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Years, and Import value in billion Indian rupees in each Years on the y axis.
The Import value in billion Indian rupees is highest at Years FY 2014 and lowest at Years FY 2011.
The highest Years FY 2014 has 5156.03 more Import value in billion Indian rupees than the lowest Years FY 2011.
Import value in billion Indian rupees at Years FY 2014 is 9978.85 , second place is FY 2019 at 9860.2, and thirdly is FY 2013 at 8918.71.
Over the past 9 Yearss, the Import value in billion Indian rupees has decreased.
The Years FY 2014 tends to be 1.33 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Yearss, we get total 67680.47.
